Articles.Content:
Hey all!

Been here since around 0.10.1 - I\'ve just been lurking around and getting to know people before I wanted to introduce myself.

I came here from Wiremod, where I was once the hoster of the unofficial wiremod server.

I\'ve been doing alot of spacebuild in wiremod. I\'ve also been playing alot of Orbiter.

So Kerbal is not something new and strange to me.

Just glad to see such a beatuiful game rise with such a nice community!

Cheers, Tasuit.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Oh spacebuild, those were the days.

I used to play spacebuild, but I can not STAND the new SB3, or LS3. I am a sucker for vanilla SB2, LS2, with lots of custom weapons. That makes originality a factor, and not a bunch of useless entities...

I have cycled through a lot of different space games myself: Spacebuild, EVE, KSP, Orbiter.

I am currently only playing EVE and KSP out of those 4, the other 2 got kind of old IMO.
